content: wishing well chain=chain sl=slipstitch single_crochet=single_crochet half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet double_crochet=double_crochet tc=triple crochet yarn lyric by coats 70m /50 gramm 1 skein grey 1 skein brown hook 3 5 european size brown 4 chain make ring with sl in first chain note begin every round with 2 chain instead of first single_crochet or 3 chain instead of first double_crochet round 1 12 single_crochet round 2 increase by make 2 single_crochet in every second single_crochet of round 1 round 3 increase by make 2 single_crochet in every third single_crochet of round 2 round 4 increase by make 2 single_crochet in every third single_crochet of round 3 round 5 increase by make 2 single_crochet in every fourth single_crochet of round 4 round 6 increase by make 2 single_crochet in every fifth single_crochet of round 5 round 7 increase by make 2 single_crochet in every sixth single_crochet of round 6 round 8 increase by make 2 single_crochet in every seventh single_crochet of round 7 please note adjust increases to your yarn and way of crocheting add more stitches if necessary to get a flat circle close to the edge of the toilet paper roll continue with grey yarn grey round 9 continue with double_crochet and increase by making 2 double_crochet in every seventh single_crochet of round 8 round 10 now decrease all double_crochet that you increased in round 9 by finishing 2 double_crochet together repeat from here no more increases or decreases needed brown 1 round single_crochet before making every sixth single_crochet get thread by stitch into the single_crochet of brown round below after the first two grey rounds you have to stitch 2 row below after that you need to get thread 1 row below if you pulled the thread through single_crochet below get another loop as if you make a normal single_crochet in actual row and pull loop through the loop you got from below and finish single_crochet as usual that gives you a big stitch right over the grey double_crochet round below the one you are actually making grey 1 double_crochet in every single_crochet of round below continue by repeating these 2 rounds until desired size of the wall for my toilet paper roll i needed 5 repeatings you may cast off the last single_crochet if you like if you want a nice plaster effect continue with crocheting cobbles work with grey yarn and increase by double every sixth double_crochet for the uneven effect make random shapes by making one or more single_crochet followed by one or more half_double_crochet followed by one or more double_crochet followed by one or more half_double_crochet followed by one or more single_crochet and so on make as much rounds as you like if you got the desired shape of the cobbles cast off and add some stones by embellishing with brown yarn feel free to go on with embellishing i made some vines by making chain and connect to the well here and there add small flowers i made some with 5 picots in a chain ring pull
